pr_title: Pull up ListIterable.binarySearch() as default methods.

timeline.bodyText: Note that this overload binarySearch(T key) already casts this and is already default. Not sure why we only did one of the two methods, but I'm guessing it had to do with complex generics.
timeline.author: motlin

timeline.message:
Pull up ListIterable.binarySearch() as default methods.
